title: BOLD Magazine Cover Font
content:
Does anyone know this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203232559im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/5f74d5d80ab606679b7435c742fb365a_19432_3475.jpg)

 [‹ Euopean street sign face?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203232559/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41669 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fokker airplane markings ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203232559/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41661 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Deluxee

comments.content:
Arial Black? Maybe Helvetica Black.

- Lex

Based on the length of the crossbar of the ’E’ I’d say Arial Black.

- Lex
